Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12970 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12970 affecting package fluent-bit for versions less than 3.0.6-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package fluent-bit is earlier than 3.0.6-5, affected by CVE-2025-12970
